root.name: Blackjack
root.description: Launch Game Blackjack was a North American launch game for the Atari 2600 on October 1977. The game launched alongside other 2600 launch titles that included: * Air-Sea Battle* Basic Math* Combat* Indy 500 * Star Ship * Street Racer* Surround * Video OlympicsNine launch games in total for the Atari 2600 near the end of the disco age.
